title: Sen. Edward Markey and Musk exchange barbs on impersonation scandal
description: The fight comes after the lawmaker demanded answers on Twitter’s verification process.

title: In Brazil, Counter-Strike fans turn cheering into an over-the-top artform
description: Counter-Strike esports finally came to Brazil, to fans’ raucous delight.

title: The tech CEO spending millions to stop Elon Musk
description: Dan O’Dowd is on a one-man crusade to challenge what he sees as the cavalier development of dangerous technology, starting with Tesla’s ‘Full Self Driving.’
